googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingNotesCombined: * Early voting for the presidential election begins 15 days before the election, although voters can request a ballot in-person starting 30 days before the election.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRulesCombined:
* All Colorado elections are held by mail.  
* You can still request a one-time absentee ballot if you will be away from home during a specific election.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: Colorado voters must include their Colorado driver's license number, state ID number, or the last 4 digits of their social security number with their online voter registration application.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Colorado voters must provide their Colorado driver's license number, state ID number, or the last four digits of their social security number with their voter registration application.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingInPersonInfoCombined: * Early voting for the presidential election begins 15 days before the election, although voters can request a ballot in-person starting 30 days before the election.
